data.title: The Influence of Online Journalism On Revenue Generation of Nigeria News Media A Study of The News Agency of Nigeria (Nan)
data.meta_description: 17637 the Influence of Online Journalism on Revenue Generation of Nigeria News Media a Study of the News Agency of Nigeria (Nan) - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is a thesis submitted by Edeh Ginika Uzochukwu to the Department of Mass Communication at the University of Nigeria, Nsukka in partial fulfillment of the requirements for a Masters of Art degree in Mass Communication. The thesis examines the influence of online journalism on revenue generation in Nigerian news media, using the News Agency of Nigeria as a case study. It consists of five chapters that discuss the background of the study, literature review, methodology, data analysis and presentation, and conclusions and recommendations. The thesis aims to suggest alternative revenue sources for Nigerian media houses and recommendations for the government to boost the functionality of news agencies in the digital age.
data.text: The Influence of Online Journalism On Revenue Generation of Nigeria News Media A Study of The News Agency of Nigeria (Nan)
